title: [Large-scale] Optimizing Science Education Through Computer-Managed Learning Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary computer literacy and secondary-level science knowledge
context.additional_context: Learners access modular content (15-20 minutes daily) via mobile devices and use a platform with peer feedback systems

learning_goals: Learners can design individualized learning pathways through a computer-managed system with 90% accuracy
Learners can interact at least three times per week using a peer feedback system and apply learning content at over 80% proficiency
Learners can improve their understanding of scientific concepts from 75% to 90% proficiency through formative assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
